document_data.name: ''Thoerl''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Thoerl''''' was an ancient [[moonblade]] possessed by [[Tyllaetha Silverspear]], matriarch of House [[Silverspear]] of [[Evermeet]] around [[1368 DR]]. It was long considered to be a symbol of the house.
